thread.title: Mother Of Benghazi Victim Calls Out Hillary Clinton | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: Mother Of Benghazi Victim Calls Out Hillary Clinton | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Mother Of Benghazi Victim Calls Out Hillary Clinton | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
Patricia Smith is the mother of Sean Smith, one of the Americans killed in Benghazi Libya in 2012. She claims Hillary Clinton has treated her like dirt.
While being interviewed by CNN Newsroom host Carol Costello, Smith said:
She has not called me. She has not contacted me. She has not given me any information except to tell me I am not a member of the immediate family and I do not need to know.
Costello responded:
They told you that?
Smith also said Hillary’s testimony in January 2013 is a lie. Clinton said it was her job “to figure out what happened and do everything [they could] to prevent it from happening again.
Smith stated:
She’s lying! She’s absolutely lying!
